article.title: Lockheed to Support AH-64D/E Sensors
article.text: ?Lockheed Martin Missile and Fire Control, Orlando, Florida, was awarded a $18,088,906 firm-fixed-price indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for field service representative support of the sensor components of the AH-64D/E Apache system, with an estimated completion date of December 31, 2019. One bid was solicited with one received. Funding and work location will be determined with each order. The Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity (W58RGZ-15-D-0002).
